sentences: Henrik Drabløs Lødøen (born 20 October 1991 in Brattvåg, Norway) is a Norwegian jazz drummer.
Career ==
Lødøen got his diploma from the jazz program at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology in 2015.
In Trondheim he started collaborations with a number of the up coming young Norwegian and swedish jazz musicians.
Among them are Megalodon Collective, Stig Ulv, DRØM, Rohey, Ósk and Les Casanovas.
Honors ==
Winner of Jazzintro at the 2016 Moldejazz with Megalodon Collective
Nominated for best jazz album at Spellemann (norwegian grammys) with Megalodon Collective
Nominated for best newcomer of the year at Spellemann (norwegian grammys) with Rohey
